code: import React from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{setAgentType}from'../../store/chatSlice';import'./AgentSelector.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AgentSelector=_ref=>{let{disabled=false}=_ref;const{agentType}=useSelector(state=>state.chat);const dispatch=useDispatch();const agentOptions=[{value:'normal',label:'Normal'},{value:'create',label:'Create'},{value:'explain',label:'Explain'},{value:'schema',label:'Schema'},{value:'longanswer',label:'Long Answer'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"agent-selector",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Agent Mode:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{value:agentType,onChange:e=>dispatch(setAgentType(e.target.value)),disabled:disabled,className:"agent-select",children:agentOptions.map(option=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:option.value,children:option.label},option.value))})]});};export default AgentSelector;
